QuestData.Title: Your Presence is Required at Agmar's Hammer
QuestData.Description: $C, I know these tuskarr will ask you to do many favors for them, but you must get to Agmar's Hammer with all due haste!$B$BThe upheaval in the land this morning is sure to have broader repercussions than just inconveniencing the natives.$B$BThe Hammer is westward past the intersection of the road leading north out of the harbor. Archmage Aethas Sunreaver himself will be expecting you!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with the Image of Archmage Aethas Sunreaver at Agmar's Hammer.
QuestData.RewardText: What took you so long? Time waits only for Aspects, $r.$B$BWe have much work to do, you and I.
